ovdesc.p: This table is used to capture the Arrangement and Limit details from the user in the AA Retail Lending Process workflow

desc.p: Defines the date from which the Arrangement will be effective
Denotes whether the Limit is Secured/Unsecured Limit. If set to YES (secured Limit), then Collateral right and Collateral is to be created for this Limit.
Specifies the Product group of the arrangement to be created.
Must be a valid record in AA.PRODUCT.GROUP table
Specifies the Product of the Arrangement to be created.
Must be a valid record in AA.PRODUCT table
Specifies whether Limit is to be created for this Customer
This is a multi valued field.
The Currency of the Arrangement/Limit to be created.
Must be a valid record in the CURRENCY table
Denotes the Customer for whom the Arrangement/Limit is to be created.
Must be a valid record in the CUSTOMER table
